Posts.Content: After having a lumpectomy and node removal in May my wound under the arm got infected,  I was readmitted to hospital to have wound cleaned the following week.  Still having wound packed and dressed every day, the radio therapy has been put back twice and now scheduled for 8th July., providing the wound has healed.  Any ideas on promoting a quicker healing process would be greatly appreciated. really fed up with it now.
Posts.Title: Two steps forward, ten back!!!

Posts.Content: Thanks for your replies, I will keep on with the exercises.
Posts.Title: Help

Posts.Content: Hi I am new to this group and just wondered if anyone has any advice.  I have lumpectomy and node removal in May, then had more surgery to clean an infection in the lymph node site.  Since then I have been doing the exercises and have good mobility in my arm but it is very sore and feels really tight below my elbow on the inner arm extending to my hand.  Any ideas??
Posts.Title: Help
